title: Betting Favorite Ohio State; Bold Predictions; Brutal Attempt at Creativity
description:
Rece Davis and Pete Thamel discuss the interesting moment in time for Ohio State, their eagerness to see Michigan against a top opponent, the overlooked ranked matchup of the weekend, predictions for the second half of the season, what we’ll learn after watching USC-Utah, Rece texting Bill Walton about the Grateful Dead and a Volunteer fan rapping about the Tide.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Rece Davis, Pete Thamel
itunes:subtitle: LISTEN: Rece Davis and Pete Thamel discuss Ohio State's potential, bold predictions for the second half of the season and a tough look for a Tennessee fan
